name: One Man Fat Butt
description:

we like to put it on google play .

and add some stuff...

CONTROLS :

W = JUMP

D = RIGHT

A = LEFT

Change Object

"Press" up arrow = 1 to 7

"Press" down arrow = 7 to 1

OR

Mouse Wheel up = 1 to 7

Mouse Wheel down = 7 to 1

Create an Object

Mouse Left Button = Create an Object

Mouse Right Button = Remove and Object

The Boy and the Girl sometimes stucks on the wall because in the

wrong position This cant be fix is in your hands by removing them :D
